description.english: Choose to play on Brutal difficulty.
Choose to play in roguelike mode.
Drive off thieves without losing any tents.
Trade away a character to another team.
Have a character acquire a personal weapon.
Unlock steel weapons and armor at Agarwal's.
Become liked in the shadowling community.
Have a character agree to a marriage proposal.
Drive a spirit away from camp.
Deal a cumulative total of 1000 damage or more to your enemies in battle.
Fall short of funds on payday.
Have a character bunk up in another's tent for the night.
Choose to play on Challenging difficulty.
Send a character off to retrain in a new class.
Acquire a deck of Psy Clash cards.
Spend at least 3000 aura at the shop in one day.

stats_thresholds.stat_name: Max Spent in One Shopping Trip

description.english: Promote characters to an advanced class 10 times.
One of your characters passed away.
Kick at least 10 characters off your teams.
A character has resigned from your team.
Get booed in the arena 8 times or more.

displayName.english: Curse your sudden but inevitable betrayal

description.english: Recruit bronze golems 5 times or more.

Recruit golden spriggats 10 times or more.
Recruit psy healers 20 times or more.
Recruit red spriggats 10 times or more.
Recruit stone golems 5 times or more.
Attack from an elevated position 50 times or more.
Attack from behind 60 times or more.
Form ice bridges 5 times or more.
Make characters collide with things 25 times or more.
Build bridge tiles 10 times or more.
Use holds to secure a position 20 times or more.
Make enemies fall off of an elevated space 30 times or more.
Make an ally fall off of an elevated space.
Leave characters with the trainer 25 times or more.
